text: Harold Chapman (born 1927) is a photographer noted for chronicling the 1950s in Paris. Harold Chapman may also refer to: *Harold Chapman (orthodontist) (1881–1965), England's first exclusive Orthodontic practitioner *Harold Chapman (rugby league), rugby league footballer of the 1920s and 1930s who played for Castleford *Harold Chapman (footballer), association footballer who played for New Zealand
title: Harold Chapman (disambiguation)
